message.body: Thank you! Merry Cheistmas to you too! Is it too late to send the edits to your poem?! I looked it over and had some suggestions but also, I really really liked it.
They are all very minor. Did you already send it?
Send them! I'd love to hear your thoughts. And...I have stories....just to tell ! No editing!
Send me stories !!! Or tell me stories! Yes!
When are you around ? I want to hear yours!!!
